title: Online Competency-Based Science Education Design and Assessment Process

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of secondary science education and practical experience in current teaching
context.additional_context: Designing and operating competency-based online education for in-service professionals, optimizing learning activities in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Students can define scientific problem-solving competencies and establish evaluation criteria using rubrics.
Students can implement competency-based instructional design that systematically provides learner feedback in blended (online/offline) environments.
Students can design summative assessments to measure the growth of learners' scientific thinking using smartphone-based evaluation tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
